amendment.description: At the end of division E (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.__. Each amount made available in division E, except those amounts made available to the Department of Defense, is hereby reduced by 14 percent.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 97 printed in Part A of House Report 116-111 to reduce spending for each amount in Division E, except those amounts made available to the Department of Defense, by 14 percent.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Banks amendment (A121) Failed by recorded vote: 132 - 302 (Roll no. 365).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Banks amendment (A121) Failed by recorded vote: 132 - 302 (Roll no. 365).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A121) offered by Mr. Banks.
